item.title: Quickstart
Privacy Policy
item.description: This Privacy Policy document describes how your personal information is handled in the DAG Monitor app. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. We Collect No Personal Information We do not collect, use, save, or have access to any of your personal data recorded in DAG Monitor. Individual settings relating to the app are not shared with developer and are stored only on your device.
